channel.title: [SphereCraft] Factions / PvP / Shops / Portal / Spleef
channel.description:
SphereCraft, A pvp, faction, eco based server. Start out in a beautiful environment and chose your path! Slay enemy's, make allies, and earn cash to buy in-game goods!
*Get 5 DIAMONDS for FREE, when first joining the server!*
-Fun factions -Fair and fun PVP (Arena included!) -Shops (Buy anything from diamonds to building materials!) -Mob Arena ( Mobs spawn and you get exp and items!) Also animal arena. -Portals (Teleport to places of the map to start building!) -NO LAG! -24/7! -WEBSITE! -AMAZING RANKS! -DONATOR PRIVILEGES! IP: [size=36pt]184.171.170.10:25574[/size]
Added no-cheat and other plguins!
